data.title: Edmonton Convention Centre
data.meta_description: Find out your options for parking at the Edmonton Convention Centre, including underground and wheelchair accessible options!
data.text:
Located in the heart of downtown Edmonton, the Edmonton Convention Centre is within walking distance of many nearby parking lots and parkades. In addition to metered parking along Jasper Avenue and connected side streets, there are three nearby parkades/surface parking lots just next to the venue. Reserved parking is available in select lots (subject to availability), including the underground Canada Place parkade directly connected to the convention centre.

For information on traffic restrictions or road closures surrounding the Edmonton Convention Centre, visit the City of Edmonton’s traffic disruptions page.

Please be aware that EPark hours of operation in existing downtown zones will extend from 6 p.m. to 10 p.m. on Rogers Place arena event nights, at a rate of $3.50 per hour. The two hour parking limit in these areas will also be extended to five hours after 5 p.m. on event nights. For a complete list of events at Rogers Place arena, please visit their events calendar.

Grierson Hill

Surface lot located across from Edmonton Convention Centre on Grierson Hill

Pedestrian overpass access to Assembly Level

NOT wheelchair accessible; 2 handicap stalls

Parking meter pay station/QR Code scanning available

Monday to Friday Rates

Hourly: $5.00

Full Day to 6pm: $15.00

6pm – 6am: $6

Saturday, Sunday, and Statutory Holiday Rates

$5.00 Flat Rate

You can pay for your parking at the Grierson Hill parking meter pay station, or by following this link or scanning the QR Code below:

Bike Parking

If you’d like to park your bike at the Edmonton Convention Centre, please utilize the bike racks located on the west side of the Jasper Avenue entrance (in front of Edmonton Welcome Centre) or next to the Assembly level entrance.

Please note: Access to the venue may be limited to specific door locations during certain events.

Canada Place Underground Parkade

Located at 9700 Jasper Avenue (across the street from the Edmonton Convention Centre)

Underground parking & pedway access (P2 door)

500 stalls

Wheelchair accessible; 6 handicap stalls

Payments accepted: Coins, notes, credit cards

Monday to Friday Rates

$5/hour

6am – 6pm: $15 max

5pm – 2am: $10 max

Midnight – 8am: $5 max

Midnight – Midnight: $30 max

Saturday and Sunday Rates

Hourly Rate (or portion of): $2/hour

6am – 6pm: $10 max

5pm – 2am: $10 max

Midnight – 8am: $5 max

Midnight – Midnight: $25 max

Statutory Holidays*: Free

For the most updated rates, please visit edmonton.ca.

Courtyard by Marriott
